# External Documentation Hub

> A documentation index that references only external resources without internal companion files.

## Master Index

- [Python Documentation](https://docs.python.org/3/): Official Python language documentation
- [GitHub Guides](https://guides.github.com/): Comprehensive Git and GitHub tutorials
- [Markdown Specification](https://commonmark.org/): CommonMark specification reference

## Resources

All documentation is maintained at external sources. This index serves as a curated navigation point.

## FAQ

For frequently asked questions, visit the Python FAQ at https://docs.python.org/3/faq/
